headline: Procter & Gamble (PG): Assessing Valuation After a Steady Year-Long Decline
summary: If you own Procter & Gamble (PG) or have had it on your watchlist, you might be wondering what to do next. There hasn’t been a major catalyst in the headlines, yet the stock’s recent slide may have caught your attention. Whenever a household name like Procter & Gamble drops back a bit, it’s natural for investors to wonder whether this is a quiet warning or a hidden opportunity. Looking back over the past year, Procter & Gamble’s shares have drifted down nearly 10%, and the pain has been...
